name: OneIMS
overview:
Today’s fast-paced world depends on efficiency. OneIMS understands that time is limited. Therefore, at OneIMS, they have brought together a wide-range of marketing services under one roof so you can save time keeping your costs to a minimum.

OneIMS’ integrated marketing approach utilizes the latest tools and resources to ensure your message is clear, powerful and cohesive. They take all forms of communication - both on and off-line, to create marketing campaigns that will engage your audience, improve your brand awareness and increase your sales.

OneIMS will partner with you to create an image that will truly represent your company. After all, your brand identity defines who you are. By establishing consistency among all your marketing channels, you can create an effective and powerful presence for your business. Developing a cohesive brand image is certainly attainable when the marketing strategies are formulated and implemented by the same creative team. Let OneIMS make a difference in your marketing campaigns with their integrated approach.

Whether you are a budding company or an established, renowned corporation, they have the capabilities and industry knowledge to make your ideas a reality.
